author: _shemnon
content: Tpyo fixes need to be summarily closed by rule. Here we have someone whose fix was to remove a bullet point griefing on reddit when they didn't get credit for their non-subtative fix: https://www.reddit.com/r/ethdev/comments/1q11fbq/ethereum_erc_contributor_stole_my_pr_threatened/

author: nixo.eth
content: seems reasonable to me to deny a typo fix from a new contributor but merge one from a regular contributor who mostly does substantive PRs. i'm also seeing a ton of typo fix PRs in other repos from random new accounts that are likely sybils

author: _shemnon
content: Are there any AI auto-tpyo fixers the EF can point at the EIP repo and snipe the real low hanging fruit?
